tasks.title: Add Snore Tracking Settings
tasks.description: Create a settings toggle for enabling/disabling snore tracking. Make feature opt-in only.
acceptanceCriteria: User can enable/disable Snore Tracking from settings
Default is disabled until explicitly enabled
Permission request for microphone shown when enabling

tasks.title: Implement Overnight Audio Recording
tasks.description: Use device microphone to record audio overnight. Trigger short recordings when noise exceeds threshold.
acceptanceCriteria: Audio recording session can start/stop manually
Recording automatically starts if bedtime reminder and feature enabled
Only short clips (5â€“20s) are stored, not continuous 8-hour recording

tasks.title: Snore Event Detection
tasks.description: Analyze audio clips for snoring patterns using frequency/amplitude analysis.
acceptanceCriteria: FFT or classifier detects snore vs non-snore
Snore events tagged with intensity: low, medium, high

tasks.title: Store Snore Metadata
tasks.description: Save snore event metadata in Firestore. Store audio clips locally with option to upload if Premium enabled.
acceptanceCriteria: Firestore schema: id, userId, date, startTime, durationSeconds, intensity, clipUrl (optional)
Premium users can upload clips to cloud storage (Firebase Storage)

tasks.title: Session Management
tasks.description: Allow starting/stopping snore tracking session manually or automatically at bedtime.
acceptanceCriteria: Automatic start at bedtime reminder if feature enabled
Session ends when user wakes or stops manually
